member.name: T:Maoli.Mvc.CepAttribute
member.summary: Validates a CEP code.

member.name: M:Maoli.Mvc.CepAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CepAttribute class.

member.name: M:Maoli.Mvc.CepAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CepAttribute class.
member.param: The error message to associate with a validation control if validation fails.

member.name: M:Maoli.Mvc.CepAttribute.#ctor(System.String,Maoli.CepPunctuation)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CepAttribute class.
member.param: The error message to associate with a validation control if validation fails.
Indicates how punctuation will be handled.

member.name: M:Maoli.Mvc.CepAttribute.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value matches the pattern of a valid CEP.
member.returns: true if the specified value is valid or null; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Maoli.Mvc.CepAttribute.GetClientValidationRules(System.Web.Mvc.ModelMetadata,System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext)
member.summary: Gets a list of client validation rules for the property.
member.returns: A list of remote client validation rules for the property.
